articles.title: Blade Runner: Enhanced Edition - Launch Trailer - IGN
articles.description: The classic adventure game based on Ridley Scott's science-fiction epic is available now on PC and consoles.

articles.title: Dusk Diver 2 - Official Release Date Trailer - IGN
articles.description: Dusk Diver 2, will launch in North America and Europe on August 30, 2022. The game will launch physically and digitally for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and the Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: The Man From Toronto Review - IGN

articles.description:

articles.title: Digimon Adventure Taichi Yagami 20th Anniversary Figure
articles.description:
The Digimon Adventure Taichi Yagami & Agumon 20th Anniversary Figure from Megahouse is now open for preorder!

articles.title: NHRA: Speed for All - Announcement Trailer - IGN
articles.description: Top Fuel, Funny Car, Pro Stock, Pro Mod, & Super Modified drag racers tear up the roads when NHRA: Speed for All comes out August 26, 2022, for PlayStation/4, Xbox Series X|S / Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam.

articles.title: Naraka Bladepoint - Xbox Launch Trailer - IGN
articles.description: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT is Available now on Xbox Series X|S, and included with Game Pass. Enjoy the mythical action Battle Royale on Day One!

articles.title: New Tolkien Book, The Fall of Númenor, Collects All The Stories That Influenced The Rings of Power TV Show - IGN
articles.description: A new book, The Fall of Númenor, collects all of Tolkien's writings about the Second Age - the stories on which The Rings of Power TV show is based.
